wikipedia_page.main: Alexander S. Forbes was a Scottish professional footballer. He played for Luton Town, Bournemouth and Gillingham between 1928 and 1935, making over 100 appearances in the English Football League.

response: Forbes played 14 times for Scotland between 1947 and 1952. He also represented Scotland at ice hockey.Alex Forbes 1925-2014, Arsenal FC.
* Alex Forbes (1925–2014), Scottish football player (Arsenal, Scotland)
